### JoulesEye project
Our work, [JoulesEye](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3631422), which we collaborated on with Prof [Mayank Goel](http://www.mayankgoel.com/), has received extensive coverage from various media outlets like [Hackster.io](https://www.hackster.io/news/your-wearable-is-lying-to-you-28f2e5f56338), [Medium](https://www.hackster.io/news/your-wearable-is-lying-to-you-28f2e5f56338), [Indian Express](https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/ahmedabad/research-scholar-at-iitgn-develops-device-to-overcome-fitness-monitoring-limitations-9180741/), [CMU News](https://www.cs.cmu.edu/news/2024/jouleseye), [Indian Education Dairy](https://indiaeducationdiary.in/thermal-camera-detects-breathing-patterns-to-enhance-exercise-calorie-estimates/), [ZME Science](https://www.zmescience.com/science/news-science/smartwatch-thermal-camera-calories/), [Knowridge](https://knowridge.com/2024/04/thermal-camera-could-boost-exercise-tracking-accuracy/), [TechXplore](https://techxplore.com/news/2024-04-thermal-camera-calorie.html), [EurekaAlert](https://www.eurekalert.org/news-releases/1040652).
</div>

### UBICOMP Gaetano Borriello Outstanding Student Award
Our PhD student, [Rishiraj Adhikary](https://rishi-a.github.io) was a finalist for the UbiComp [Gaetano Borriello Outstanding Student Award](https://ubicomp.org/sc/awards.html) 2023.

### SpiroMask project
Our work, [SpiroMask](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3570167) was covered comprehensively by [The Ahmedabad Mirror](https://www.ahmedabadmirror.com/iit-gn-researchers-devise-mask-to-measure-lung-health/81846808.html) on 3rd November 2022. A technical article was also written on [EdgeImpulse](https://www.edgeimpulse.com/blog/just-take-a-deep-breath/).
</div>

### PhD student Rishiraj's Fullbright Nehru Fellowship
Our PhD student, [Rishiraj Adhikary](https://rishi-a.github.io) won the prestigious Fullbright Nehru fellowship and visited CMU to work with Prof. [Mayank Goel](http://www.mayankgoel.com/) for 9 months. This achievement was covered by the following media channels: [Education Times](https://www.educationtimes.com/article/scholarships/91766182/cross-domain-knowledge-helped-phd-student-get-fullbright-nehru-doctoral-research-fellowship), [Indian Express](https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/ahmedabad/iitgn-phd-scholar-bags-fulbright-nehru-fellowship-7928541/), [Ahmedabad Mirror](https://ahmedabadmirror.com/iitgns-phd-scholar-awarded-fellowship/81833150.html), [India Education Diary](https://indiaeducationdiary.in/iit-gandhinagar-phd-scholar-bags-the-prestigious-fulbright-nehru-doctoral-research-fellowship-2022-23/), [Careers 360](https://news.careers360.com/iit-gandhinagar-computer-science-engineering-phd-scholar-wins-fulbright-nehru-doctoral-research-fellowship-2022-23).
</div>
